meanings.definition: The state or quality of being unlovely.
meanings.sent1: The unlovelinesses of the old building made it hard to admire.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't ignore the unlovelinesses of the messy room.
meanings.sent3: Despite the unlovelinesses of the situation, they found humor in it.
meanings.sent4: The unlovelinesses of the city's pollution clouded the sky.
meanings.sent5: The unlovelinesses of the abandoned house were haunting.

meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with unlovelinesses like wilted flowers and overgrown weeds.
meanings.sent2: She tried to overlook the unlovelinesses in the painting and focus on its beauty.
meanings.sent3: The unlovelinesses in the room seemed to multiply when no one was looking.
meanings.sent4: The unlovelinesses of the broken vase mirrored the shattered pieces of her heart.
meanings.sent5: The unlovelinesses of the situation were like dark clouds hanging over their heads.
